text:
Hi Community! :smile:
Is it possible to create a custom made drop down banner or ticker tape in the design manager? We just use the marketing hub so don't have the HubSpot CMS (with bought templates and modules and there isn't an option for this).
Iâ€™ve definitely used e.preventDefault() in the past for custom validation in a similar way

Hey there, this is documentation for the old drag and drop design manager layouts. They were what we had before the in-page editor experience supported drag and drop.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-templates>

Those old templates are not supported in CMS Starter, and do not support much of the newer functionality in CMS Hub like drag and drop areas - which allow 2d placement of modules, reusable sections, memberships, etc.

We advise building using coded templates. They offer a drastically better development experience, and a drastically better experience for the content creator.
